channel.title: Daily News Feed Update #1
channel.description: Daily collected titles from multiple sources

item.title: English Editorials (Update #1) • The Rohingya’s vanishing homeland • Public procurement must be freed from corruption

Magazines (Update #1) • RFK, Jr., Cites ‘Truly Appalling’ Studies to Tie Autism to Circumcision and Tylenol • This Bat Recorded Itself Catching and Eating a Songbird in Midair • Birds Went Silent during the Great North American Eclipse—Here’s What Researchers Discovered • Record-Breaking Everest Blizzard Explained • How Bacteria Use CRISPR to Vaccinate against Viruses • AI Can Predict Cat Health From Litter Box Visits • Therapy may be the most effective way to ease irritable bowel syndrome • We've discovered another reason why naked mole rats live for so long • Swirly lasers can control an ungovernable cousin of magnetism • Hidden ecosystem of the ovaries plays a surprising role in fertility • Top 250 oil and gas firms own just 1.5% of the world's renewable power • King Richard III's oral microbiome hints he had severe gum disease • Pig liver transplant into a living person edges it closer to the norm

International (Update #1) • President Petro accuses US of killing Colombians in attacks on ‘narco-boats’ • Philippines earthquake: tsunami warning for coasts including Indonesia after 7.4 quake hits Mindanao – live updates • Tsunami warning for Philippines and Indonesia after 7.4-magnitude earthquake strikes Mindanao • HSBC makes £10bn bet on Hong Kong as ‘super-connector’ for China and west • ‘Radioactive’ shrimp crisis: Indonesia grapples with contaminated industrial zone • Australia news live: Hannah Thomas begins legal action against NSW; Allegra Spender quits parliamentary sports club after Pocock ban • NSW police reveal operation targeting ‘kill cars’ used by alleged Sydney crime gangs • Boy, 15, dead after being hit by a truck outside Bendigo school • Former Wallabies star David Pocock booted from parliamentary sports club • Melbourne bar ranked best in Australasia and 19 in world • Belgian PM reported to be among targets of ‘jihad-inspired’ drone plot • Grisly recording reveals bat catching, killing and eating robin mid-flight • László Krasznahorkai wins the Nobel prize in literature 2025 • French appeal court increases sentence of Gisèle Pelicot rapist • Norway braces for Trump’s reaction if he does not win Nobel peace prize • Israel’s government approves hostage and ceasefire deal – as it happened • Hamas and Israel prepare to implement ceasefire as Netanyahu says deal approved by government • Gaza ceasefire plan: how much credit does Trump deserve? – podcast • ‘Everyone is still afraid’: ceasefire deal brings relief to Gaza but fears remain over future • ‘Thank God we witnessed this’: Palestinians on the ceasefire deal - Today in Focus Extra • Further arrests made over ‘shocking’ arson attack on Peacehaven mosque • Majority of family court cases in England and Wales feature domestic abuse, watchdog says • Man rearrested at Manchester airport after synagogue attack detention • Rishi Sunak takes advisory roles with Microsoft and AI firm Anthropic • Prince William to attend Cop30 UN climate summit in Brazil • US anti-fascism expert blocked from flying to Spain at airport • From boom to backlash: has Taylor Swift lost her touch? – podcast • New York attorney general calls bank fraud indictment ‘desperate weaponization of our justice system’ – as it happened • Arizona sheriff’s office misused millions set aside to remedy racial profiling • Judge temporarily blocks Trump’s effort to deploy national guard in Chicago
